byline.original: By TIM ARANGO and DURAID ADNAN
byline.contributor: An employee of The New York Times contributed reporting from Hilla, Iraq.

snippet: A blast in the southern Shiite town of Hilla was a reminder that random attacks and assassinations are still daily occurrences.
lead_paragraph: A blast in the southern Shiite town of Hilla was a reminder that random attacks and assassinations are still daily occurrences.

headline.main: Car Bomb at Funeral in Iraq Kills at Least 7 and Hurts Scores
headline.print_headline: Car Bomb at Funeral in Iraq Kills at Least 7 and Hurts Scores
headline.seo: Car Bomb Explodes at Funeral in Iraq
